ComicInfo.Summary:
Conan the Conquerer: Part 4
Chapter I: Drums of Peril Chapter II: The Road to Acheron Rattle of Bones - Solomon Kane discovers power and evil in the skeleton of a sorcerer!
Wizards of the Black Sun - Red Sonja, another sorcerer, some tough choices and a talking three-legged goat!
